name: SHELL ASCENDER
description:
A.D. 3142, Human are ruled by the artificial intelligence they have created since the late 21 century. Artificial intelligence took over the eternal digital world once been built by the greedy human race at all costs. As the project searching for habitable planets failed, in physical world all human body are decayed. Digitized consciousness become the only form of existence.

100 years ago, resource of planet had been used up, last man on earth uploaded himself to the cloud. To memorize the vanished mother planet after a century, digitized human reach a consensus with the central computer: provide them mechanical shell as observers to return to the physical world. As the resources is scarce that there are only few vacancies, the virtual arena is established for battle. Fighter need to give up their existence in digital world to enter the arena, the final winner will have the ticket to get back to the physical world.
